sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.BIN_RegionID AS cityId,
A.RegionNameForeign AS cityName,
A.RegionNameChinese AS cityName,
A.RegionNameChinese AS cityName,
B.BIN_RegionID AS provinceId,
B.RegionNameForeign AS provinceName,
B.RegionNameChinese AS provinceName,
B.RegionNameChinese AS provinceName,
C.BIN_RegionID AS regionId,
C.RegionNameForeign AS regionName,
C.RegionNameChinese AS regionName,
C.RegionNameChinese AS regionName,
D.CounterCode AS counterCode, D.CounterNameIF AS counterName, D.BIN_OrganizationID AS organizationId FROM Basis.BIN_Region A, Basis.BIN_Region B, Basis.BIN_Region C, Basis.BIN_CounterInfo D, Basis.BIN_Region AD, Basis.BIN_Organization oz
JOIN () A99 ON oz.BIN_OrganizationID=A99.BIN_OrganizationID
WHERE C.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND C.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND C.RegionType = '0' AND A.NodeID.GetAncestor(1) = B.NodeID AND B.NodeID.GetAncestor(1) = C.NodeID AND D.BIN_RegionID = AD.BIN_RegionID AND AD.NodeID.IsDescendantOf(A.NodeID)=1 AND D.ValidFlag='1' AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND B.ValidFlag = '1' AND C.ValidFlag = '1' AND D.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID AND oz.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT DISTINCT B.BIN_RegionID AS regionId,
B.RegionNameForeign AS regionName
B.RegionNameChinese AS regionName
B.RegionNameChinese AS regionName
FROM Basis.BIN_Organization A JOIN Basis.BIN_Region B ON A.BIN_RegionID = B.BIN_RegionID JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterInfo C ON A.BIN_OrganizationID = C.BIN_OrganizationID JOIN Basis.BIN_Channel D ON C.BIN_ChannelID = D.BIN_ChannelID
JOIN () A99 ON A.BIN_OrganizationID=A99.BIN_OrganizationID
WHERE A.Type = '4' AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#

SELECT C.BIN_ChannelID AS channelId, A.BIN_OrganizationID AS organizationId, A.DepartCode AS departCode,
C.ChannelNameForeign AS channelName, A.NameForeign AS departName
C.ChannelName AS channelName, A.DepartName AS departName
C.ChannelName AS channelName, A.DepartName AS departName
FROM Basis.BIN_Organization A JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterInfo B ON A.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID JOIN Basis.BIN_Channel C ON B.BIN_ChannelID = C.BIN_ChannelID
JOIN () A99 ON A.BIN_OrganizationID=A99.BIN_OrganizationID
WHERE A.Type = '4' AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
A.BIN_RegionID = #regionId#

SELECT T.id, T.name, T.path, T.level FROM (SELECT A.BIN_OrganizationID AS id, A.Path AS path, A.Level AS level,
A.NameForeign AS name
A.DepartName AS name
A.DepartName AS name
FROM Basis.BIN_Organization A WHERE A.Type <> '4' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM Basis.BIN_Organization B
JOIN () A99 ON B.BIN_OrganizationID=A99.BIN_OrganizationID
WHERE B.Type = '4' AND B.ValidFlag = '1' AND B.NodeID.IsDescendantOf(A.NodeID) = 1 ) AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
UNION SELECT A.BIN_OrganizationID AS id, A.Path AS path, A.Level AS level,
A.NameForeign AS name
A.DepartName AS name
A.DepartName AS name
FROM Basis.BIN_Organization A
JOIN () A99 ON A.BIN_OrganizationID=A99.BIN_OrganizationID
WHERE A.Type = '4' AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
) T ORDER BY T.path

SELECT BIN_OrganizationID AS organizationId, ControlFlag AS controlFlag FROM Monitor.BIN_CounterMessageForbidden WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BIN_CounterMessageID = #counterMessageId# AND ValidFlag = 1

SELECT A.BIN_OrganizationID AS organizationId, B.ControlFlag AS controlFlag FROM Basis.BIN_Organization A LEFT JOIN Monitor.BIN_CounterMessageForbidden B ON A.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID AND B.BIN_CounterMessageID = #counterMessageId# WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.TYPE = '4' AND A.ValidFlag = 1

B.CounterNameIF AS counterName
B.CounterNameIF AS counterName
